duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with clients as an advisor and guide for BI, Data Engineering, and Data Analytics needs.
Design best solutions for deliverable requests and budget allocation.
Deliver solutions utilizing private and public cloud offerings, deploying data platforms, implementing ETL/ELT processes, to optimize client’s data landscapes and business intelligence capabilities.
Lead internal development teams as a hands-on contributor during project execution.
Optimize data management utilizing Azure Data Factory, Stream, Synapse, SQL Server, and PowerBI.
Communicate professionally with external clients and have the ability and passion to mentor others.

education_certification.credential: Accomplished career in architecting and engineering data solutions with a Bachelor's degree in IT or related field (Master's preferred)
